main.title: contact
main.article:
Contact

jemris is developed and maintained by ...

Dr. Tony Stöcker (project founder)
Framework design, sequence and solver implementation, symbolic attribute observation.
Fields of research: basic MRI physics, tailored MRI sequence design.

Kaveh Vahedipour
Framework design, sequence implementation, parallel TX/RX, package maintenance, supercomputer implementation.
Fields of research: selective excitation, non-cartesian sampling.

Dr. Daniel Pflugfelder
MPI parallelisation, performance debugging, code optimisation.
Fields of research: temporal varying processes (motion, flow, BOLD), sequence parameter optimization.
